name: Crowned Heads - Buckeye Land - Buckeye Land
additionalNotes: Crowned Heads Buckeye Land cigars are a collaboration between Crowned Heads Drew Estate that was originally made to be sold exclusively through the state of Ohio. Now available everywhere, this cigar utilizes a Connecticut Broadleaf wrapper, and Nicaraguan binder and long-filler tobaccos to provide a medium bodied profile. Premium cigar smokers from Maine to California can now enjoy Buckeye Landâ€™s rich and rewarding flavors of chocolate, creamed coffee, cedar, and spice.
